DOC.brief_summary: This trial multicenter , open-label study evaluate safety efficacy GSK1358820 treatment post-stroke subject focal wrist , finger case , thumb spasticity . Qualified patient complete GSK double-blind study 112958 enrol . Subjects receive single treatment session intramuscular GSK1358820 `` 200U 240U ( thumb spasticity present ) '' . The subject observe 12 week post injection . Outcome measure include change baseline every post injection visit measure Modified Ashworth Scale ( MAS ) , Disability Assessment Scale ( DAS ) Global Assessment Scale . Safety parameter measure include adverse event , vital sign ( pulse blood pressure ) clinical laboratory test ( haematology , serum chemistry urinanalysis ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Multicenter , Open-label , Single Dose Study Safety Efficacy GSK1358820 ( Botulinum Toxin Type A ) Chinese Subjects With Post-stroke Focal Upper Limb Spasticity
DOC.detailed_description: This trial multicenter , open-label study evaluate safety efficacy GSK1358820 treatment patient focal wrist , finger case , thumb spasticity post-stroke . Qualified patient eligible enrollment upon completion double-blind study 112958 . Patients receive single treatment session intramuscular injection GSK1358820 `` 200U 240U ( thumb spasticity present ) '' .The subject observe 12 week post injection . Each complete subject attend 4 clinic visit . The maximum study duration 13 week . The study include 1 week pretreatment period , screen visit ( visit 1 could last visit previous double-blind study 112958 time within 3 month completion previous study ) take place . Only one upper limb ( meet inclusion/exclusion criterion ) evaluate treat study . Subjects receive single intramuscular treatment investigated drug day 0 ( visit 2 ) . There two post-injection follow-up visit week 6 12 ( visit 3 4 ) .
